text: (napiye!) Umakku munnar (parpala camukankalukkum) nam anuppiya tutarkal (antanta camukankalin) urkalilirunta manitarkaleyanri verillai avarkalukku nam vahi mulam (nam kattalaikalai) arivittom - ivarkal pumiyil pirayanam ceytu ivarkalukku mun iruntavarkalin mutivu eppatiyiruntatu enpataip parkka villaiya? Marumai vitutan payapaktiyutaiyavarkalukku mikavum melanatakum; (itanai) ninkal (cintittu) vilankikkolla ventama
